input: Send a batch request to retrieve lock requests for customer 310867 and list all event specifications.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCustomerLockRequests?$filter=PartyIdentifyingElements/PartyID eq '310867' HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCustomerLockRequestEventSpecifications HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator--
